title: Yume de Aetara (TV)
ending_song: "Kaze no You na Kimi de Ite (風のような君でいて)" by Halo
sinopse: Fuguno Matsuo has never had a girlfriend all his 24 years in life and what makes things worse is that a fortune teller predicted that he never will. However, when he laid his eye on Nagisa-sensei he fell in-love right away and began earnestly wooing her. Along comes Hamaoka, a co-worker who is smitten with Fuguno, and a love-triangle ensues.
